{{champion:161}} Was my little brothers favorite champion - and my favorite champion. After he died, I kind of just kept up with him and I would say I'm a pretty decent Vel'Koz now.

Also, because he's really fun.

Wow, that hit me deep.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Now I feel bad.  Keep playing {{champion:161}} in his honor.

Aw man, that hurts...

I love {{champion:161}} as well. 
His attitude and personality is really fun and interesting. 
Its also super rewarding when you land a cheeky angle, or hit a full combo and manage to melt everyones faces off.

And his Arclight skin looks like a giant flashlight. I feel like im shining very intensely at people when i R with that skin.
I main {{champion:16}} , and it feels so good to just straight up heal someone back to full health from the brink death. Her build options see also really flexible to me.

{{champion:24}} : Because few things compare to the feeling of coming out of lane 3/0/0 and proceeding to roflstomp all but a very few other champs as well as sometimes the entire other team if you keep snowballing.

{{champion:81}} : Am I a mage? Am I an adc? Am I annoying as hell slow bot? Find out next time on you should be in a museum. Also...dat pulsefire skin.

Because I love killing my lane opponent unexpectedly after level 6.
Unexpectedly?
ya i totally never expect that low cooldown r to be used. Like why would they press that button, ever.

{{champion:105}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:7}} 

Basically I like to blow stuff up and am not responsible enough for a champion that cannot jump away from being caught out repeatedly. Also I don't really pay attention or ward so I need to be able to run away from ganks

{{champion:245}} (AP mid, takko is for pussies)

I enjoy watching health bars melt very, very fast. And sending ADCs to the 18th dimension with one ult. That too.
Right ... reminds me why I'd rather deal with Tank Ekko than AP Ekko ... at least Tank Ekko can't one-shot you as fast...

{{champion:223}} 
#Vayne mains.

{{champion:202}} 

He's just so beautiful. Every voice line is flawlessly delivered, his theme is fantastic, all of his attacks and abilities are just so *satisfying*, and when you finally land that magnificent barrage of ult bullets, bolstered on by this majestic ethereal chorus... It's just sheer perfection.

{{champion:202}} 
Because I love the slow and methodical gameplay, his character design, long range abilities, and the potential to go really, really fast.

{{champion:43}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:113}} 
Well, they've all got high-impact abilities that when used right can swing the tides of entire games. I also enjoy their personalities.

{{champion:113}} Full Team Stun. FULL. TEAM. STUN.
She's also just straight up badass, I highly doubt she tamed Bristle with just food.

{{champion:43}} Her Mantra Shields can literally breach 1k in shielding. On your whole team. Her early game is also ballin' as heck.
Like Sej, she's also pretty badass. She fought off a whole Noxian invasion force... 
**BY HERSELF.**

{{champion:45}} Over 1000 AP. Every game. Even as support.
Very reliable for bursting away late-game threats or shutting down potential late-game threats in the mid-game. Who's the King of Burst? That's right, It's VEIGAR!

{{champion:163}} ROAMING FUCKING MID.
It's like jungle, but for ~~twa-~~ mages!

{{champion:157}}

I've embrace the darkness because it's more fun than being nice to the enemy team.
